General.Name: Delta Oil & Gas Inc
General.Description: Delta Oil & Gas, Inc., an independent natural gas and oil company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of natural gas and oil properties in the United States and Canada. Its principal properties include the Texas prospect in Newton county, Texas; and the Premont Northwest field in Jim Wells county, Texas. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 710 North Post Oak Road, Houston, TX, United States, 77024

1.Name: Mr. Kulwant  Sandher B.Sc., C.A., C.P.A., CA, CPA
